document.full_text: yemen's gulf-brokered deal to remove president ali abdullah saleh from power was on the verge of collapse on sunday after saleh refused to sign, raising the threat of further instability in the arabian peninsula state.
document.title: yemen transition deal teeters as saleh fails to sign
lines_and_colors: yemen's gulf-brokered deal to remove president ali abdullah saleh from power was on the verge of collapse on sunday after saleh refused to sign, raising the threat of further instability in the arabian peninsula state.
